About Us

iJeep is a responsive website revolutionizing northbound commuting in Iligan City through real-time GPS tracking of jeepneys. Our user-friendly interface empowers commuters with accurate information to plan their journeys efficiently. We're committed to leveraging technology for positive social impact, welcoming community feedback for continuous improvement. Join us in transforming urban commuting with iJeep, ensuring a more connected and convenient cityscape for all.
